SELECT u.id as "credential_id" , u.status as "credential_status" , u.modify_by as "credential_modify_by" , u.modify_date as "credential_modify_date" , u.user_name , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , u.user_info_id , aut."name" as "authority_name" , aut."id" as "authority_id"
, us_info."id" as "user_inf_id" , us_info.first_name , us_info.last_name , us_info.gender , us_info.date_birth , us_info.phone , us_info."desc" , us_info.status , us_info.resource_id , us_info.status as "user_info_status" , us_info.modify_by as "user_info_modify_by" , us_info.modify_date as "user_info_modify_date"
, u_role."id" as "role_id" , u_role."role" as "role" , u_role.status as "role_status" , u_role.modify_by as "role_modify_by" , u_role.modify_date as "role_modify_date" FROM role_authority r_aut INNER JOIN user_ u on u.role_id = r_aut.role_id INNER JOIN authority aut on aut."id" = r_aut.authority_id INNER JOIN user_info us_info on us_info.id = u.user_info_id INNER JOIN user_role u_role on u_role."id" = u.role_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} UNION SELECT u.id as "credential_id" , u.status as "credential_status" , u.modify_by as "credential_modify_by" , u.modify_date as "credential_modify_date" , u.user_name , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , u.user_info_id , au."name" as "authority_name" , au."id" as "authority_id"
, us_info."id" as "user_inf_id" , us_info.first_name , us_info.last_name , us_info.gender , us_info.date_birth , us_info.phone , us_info."desc" , us_info.status , us_info.resource_id , us_info.status as "user_info_status" , us_info.modify_by as "user_info_modify_by" , us_info.modify_date as "user_info_modify_date"
, u_role."id" as "role_id" , u_role."role" as "role" , u_role.status as "role_status" , u_role.modify_by as "role_modify_by" , u_role.modify_date as "role_modify_date" FROM user_ as u INNER JOIN users_authorities ua on u."id" = ua.user_id INNER JOIN authority au on au."id" = ua.authority_id INNER JOIN user_info us_info on us_info.id = u.user_info_id INNER JOIN user_role u_role on u_role."id" = u.role_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY authority_id ASC;
